message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this fantastic product. I think you'll love it!
Hi Alice, $120 is a bit more than I'm comfortable paying. I'm willing to offer $90 for the product,  let me know what you think.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I can see that you're willing to pay $90, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. It's a fair price considering the product's value.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $110 is still a bit too high for me. I'm happy to meet you in the middle at $95. Let me know if that works for you.
I can see you're trying to find a sweet spot, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $100, but I'm not willing to go lower than that. It's the lowest I can go and still make it worth my while.
